name: v2.2.0
body:
## Changelog

4a9e428 Improve README.md
7d60a6b Searh checks can search with regular expressions. Search checks are counting all entires. Two checks from https://github.com/some-things/dcosjq were added: zookeeper-fsync and cockroach-time-sync.
2c151c0 Set bundle directory DirType root. Change directory.OpenFile() to not panic. Fix .gitignore.
